channel.title: Graph on Personal website
channel.description: Recent content in Graph on Personal website

item.title: Graphing Example (1)
item.description:
This is a home for various data science projects, where I try to analyse some interesting collaborate datasets, build pretty and informative graphics.

Example: Document your workflow

In this example, the coder doesn’t need to present every line of code, but rather needs to present the overall process of loading, crunching, and reporting the data, so another scientist can understand the whole process, and if necessary, replicate it. References, links, and provenance of data files are more important here, so the reader can understand where the data sets are coming from.

An example of a table created using Markdown

Code:

| Command           | Description                    |
| ------------------| ------------------------------ |
| `jekyll`            | Build your website.            |
| `hugo serve -w`   | View your website.             |

Result:

Command Description
jekyll Build your website.
hugo serve -w View your website.
